name: tc 07.02.23 Verify Order Total in Summury displayed correctly.
description: Verify Order Total in Summary: Order Total = Subtotal - Discount + Tax and displayed correctly.
descriptionHtml: Verify Order Total in Summary: Order Total = Subtotal - Discount + Tax and displayed correctly.

testStage.description: Verify Order Total in Summary: Order Total = Subtotal - Discount + Tax and displayed correctly.

steps.name: Check Order Total in the Summary Card
Get a random number between 1 and 10
Get Subtotal in the Summary Card
Get Discount in the Summary Card
